title: 1BR/1BA Apartment for Rent w/ a Breakfast Bar and Air Conditioning!
map_address: 1701 Rock Springs Drive near Lake Mead & Rock Springs Dr.
posting_body: Lease this one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment for rent at Summerlin Entrada!
This layout boasts an all-electric kitchen with a convenient breakfast bar and a spacious patio or balcony.
Each bedroom comes with a spacious walk-in closet, and various storage closets can be found throughout the floor plan.
Your apartment is kept at a comfortable temperature year-round with central heating and air conditioning, and you’ll find that laundry days can be simple with your own washer and dryer set.
Steps away from your home, you’ll have access to community amenities that include a business center, a fitness center, two pools, and a spa.
The management and maintenance teams are on site and ready to assist you any time.
You’ll also benefit from package receiving services, night patrol, and covered parking.
To learn more, call the leasing office today!
1701 Rock Springs Drive Las Vegas, NV 89128
